content: **#crochetpatterns #crochetstitches #crochetfloretstitch** **learn the easy 2 row repeat floret stitch ** use this stitch for making blankets placemats table runners pillows headbands drapery tie-backs washcloths etc i used a 6 mm crochet hook and worsted weight yarn in this demo **all my crochet stitches on youtube ** https //www youtube com/@hectanooga1/search query=crochet%20stitches **all my tutorials on youtube ** https //www youtube com/@hectanooga1/videos
